data.oai_dc:dc: Literature data on proportion of trees infested with lianas by tree species

Study is a short reference to the publication, the full citations and additional information for each study are given in "litreviewsiteinfo.csv". Genus, species, and family (when available) are the taxonomic names. n is the number of trees included. prevalence is the proportion of trees infested with lianas. load is the mean proportion of the crown infested, among infested trees (see readme)
Climbing plants|Host-parasite interactions|Lianas|Natural enemies|Plant population and community dynamics|Shade-tolerance|Tree species coexistence|Vines
